titles.title: They Say I'm Blessed Of The Lord

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
They say I'm blessed of the Lord
Oh yes I'm blessed of the Lord
I've been rescued out of sin
I've got God's Spirit deep within
I'm partaking of His grace
I'm seeing Jesus face to face
Yes I'm blessed, blessed of the Lord.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
They say I'm blessed of the Lord
Oh yes I'm blessed of the Lord
There's a manchild deep within
There's a new way to begin
Jesus said come follow me
Only then can we really see
That we're blessed, blessed of the Lord.
